channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Guardium Data Encryption
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Guardium Data Encryption

item.title: CVE-2021-39024|2024-08-04T01:58:17.274Z -- ibm -- guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 4.0.0.0 and 5.0.0.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 213862.

item.title: CVE-2021-39023|2024-08-04T01:58:17.630Z -- ibm -- guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 4.0.0 and 5.0.0 could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information when a detailed technical error message is returned in the browser. This information could be used in further attacks against the system. IBM X-Force ID: 213860.

item.title: CVE-2021-39020|2024-08-04T01:58:17.327Z -- ibm -- guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 4.0.0.7 and lower stores sensitive information in URL parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-Force ID: 213855.

item.title: CVE-2021-39027|2024-08-04T01:58:17.284Z -- ibm -- guardium%20data%20encryption
item.description: IBM Guardium Data Encryption (GDE) 4.0.0 and 5.0.0 prepares a structured message for communication with another component, but encoding or escaping of the data is either missing or done incorrectly. As a result, the intended structure of the message is not preserved. IBM X-Force ID: 213865.
